data.phrase:
// CrowdStrike Alerts over Time
config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = alerts
| bin _time span = 1d
| filter original_tags contains "CrowdStrike"
| alter str_status = if(resolution_status = ENUM.NEW, "NEW", if(resolution_status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION, "UNDER INVESTIGATION", "RESOLVED"))
| filter str_status in ($alertstatus)
| alter str_severity = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low", if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium", if(severity=ENUM.HIGH, "High", if(severity=ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical"))))
| alter str_source = if(alert_source = ENUM.CORRELATION, "CORRELATION", if(alert_source = ENUM.XDR_ANALYTICS, "XDR ANALYTICS", if(alert_source=ENUM.XDR_ANALYTICS_BIOC, "XDR ANALYTICS BIOC", if(alert_source=ENUM.XDR_BIOC, "XDR BIOC", if(alert_source = ENUM.XDR_IOC, "XDR IOC")))))

| filter str_severity in ($sev)
| filter str_source in ($alertsource)
| filter user_name = $uname
| filter host_name = $hname

| alter low_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low"), med_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium"), high_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.HIGH, "High"), crit_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical")
| comp count(low_sev_alerts) as lows, count(med_sev_alerts) as mediums, count(high_sev_alerts) as highs, count(crit_sev_alerts) as criticals by _time
| sort asc _time










| view graph type = line xaxis = _time yaxis = lows,mediums,highs,criticals seriescolor("mediums","#ffa600") seriescolor("highs","#fc4444") seriescolor("criticals","#982403") seriestitle("lows","low") seriestitle("mediums","medium") seriestitle("highs","high") seriestitle("criticals","critical")

config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = alerts
| filter original_tags contains "CrowdStrike"
| alter str_status = if(resolution_status = ENUM.NEW, "NEW", if(resolution_status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION, "UNDER INVESTIGATION", "RESOLVED"))
| filter str_status in ($alertstatus)
| alter str_severity = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low", if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium", if(severity=ENUM.HIGH, "High", if(severity=ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical"))))
| alter str_source = if(alert_source = ENUM.CORRELATION, "CORRELATION", if(alert_source = ENUM.XDR_ANALYTICS, "XDR ANALYTICS", if(alert_source=ENUM.XDR_ANALYTICS_BIOC, "XDR ANALYTICS BIOC", if(alert_source=ENUM.XDR_BIOC, "XDR BIOC", if(alert_source = ENUM.XDR_IOC, "XDR IOC")))))
| alter host = coalesce(host_name, arraystring(host_ip, ","))
| alter user = arrayindex(user_name,0)
| filter host = $hname
| filter user = $uname
| filter str_severity in ($sev)
| filter str_source in ($alertsource)
| comp count() by resolution_status
| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = resolution_status yaxis = count_1 valuecolor("RESOLVED_FALSE_POSITIVE","#aa00ff")

// CrowdStrike Alerts by User
config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = alerts

// Filter and alter
| filter original_tags contains "CrowdStrike"
| alter str_status = if(resolution_status = ENUM.NEW, "NEW", if(resolution_status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION, "UNDER INVESTIGATION", "RESOLVED"))
| filter str_status in ($alertstatus)
| alter str_severity = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low", if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium", if(severity=ENUM.HIGH, "High", if(severity=ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical"))))
| filter str_severity in ($sev)
| alter str_source = if(alert_source = ENUM.CORRELATION, "CORRELATION", if(alert_source = ENUM.XDR_ANALYTICS, "XDR ANALYTICS", if(alert_source=ENUM.XDR_ANALYTICS_BIOC, "XDR ANALYTICS BIOC", if(alert_source=ENUM.XDR_BIOC, "XDR BIOC", if(alert_source = ENUM.XDR_IOC, "XDR IOC")))))

| filter str_source in ($alertsource)
| alter host = coalesce(host_name, arraystring(host_ip, ","))
| filter host = $hname

| alter user = arrayindex(user_name,0),
        low_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low"), med_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium"), high_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.HIGH, "High"), crit_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical")
| filter user = $uname

// Comps
| comp 
    count() as alert_count, count(low_sev_alerts) as lows, count(med_sev_alerts) as mediums, count(high_sev_alerts) as highs, count(crit_sev_alerts) as criticals,
    count_distinct(alert_name) as distinct_alert_names
by user

| fields user,alert_count,distinct_alert_names,lows, mediums, highs, criticals 
| sort desc alert_count

// CrowdStrike Alerts by Host
config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = alerts

// Filter and alter
| filter original_tags contains "CrowdStrike"
| alter str_status = if(resolution_status = ENUM.NEW, "NEW", if(resolution_status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION, "UNDER INVESTIGATION", "RESOLVED"))
| filter str_status in ($alertstatus)
| alter str_severity = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low", if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium", if(severity=ENUM.HIGH, "High", if(severity=ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical"))))
| filter str_severity in ($sev)

| alter str_source = if(alert_source = ENUM.CORRELATION, "CORRELATION", if(alert_source = ENUM.XDR_ANALYTICS, "XDR ANALYTICS", if(alert_source=ENUM.XDR_ANALYTICS_BIOC, "XDR ANALYTICS BIOC", if(alert_source=ENUM.XDR_BIOC, "XDR BIOC", if(alert_source = ENUM.XDR_IOC, "XDR IOC")))))
| filter str_source in ($alertsource)
| alter host = coalesce(host_name, arraystring(host_ip, ",")),
        low_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low"), med_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium"), high_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.HIGH, "High"), crit_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical")
| filter host = $hname
| alter user = arrayindex(user_name,0)
| filter user = $uname
// Comps
| comp 
    count() as alert_count, count(low_sev_alerts) as lows, count(med_sev_alerts) as mediums, count(high_sev_alerts) as highs, count(crit_sev_alerts) as criticals,
    count_distinct(alert_name) as distinct_alert_names
by host

| fields host,alert_count,distinct_alert_names,lows, mediums, highs, criticals 
| sort desc alert_count

config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = alerts
| filter original_tags contains "CrowdStrike"
| alter str_status = if(resolution_status = ENUM.NEW, "NEW", if(resolution_status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION, "UNDER INVESTIGATION", "RESOLVED"))
| filter str_status in ($alertstatus)
| alter str_severity = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low", if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium", if(severity=ENUM.HIGH, "High", if(severity=ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical"))))
| alter str_source = if(alert_source = ENUM.CORRELATION, "CORRELATION", if(alert_source = ENUM.XDR_ANALYTICS, "XDR ANALYTICS", if(alert_source=ENUM.XDR_ANALYTICS_BIOC, "XDR ANALYTICS BIOC", if(alert_source=ENUM.XDR_BIOC, "XDR BIOC", if(alert_source = ENUM.XDR_IOC, "XDR IOC")))))
| alter host = coalesce(host_name, arraystring(host_ip, ","))
| alter user = arrayindex(user_name,0)
| filter host = $hname
| filter user = $uname
| filter str_severity in ($sev)
| filter str_source in ($alertsource)
| fields severity, resolution_status, alert_source, alert_name, description, alert_id
| sort desc _time

input_dict.xql:
config timeframe = 30d | dataset = alerts
| comp values(severity) as sevs
| fields sevs

investigationError.validation_message: Sorting by sevs field of type array is unsupported.

config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = alerts

// Filter and alter
| filter original_tags contains "CrowdStrike"
| alter str_status = if(resolution_status = ENUM.NEW, "NEW", if(resolution_status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION, "UNDER INVESTIGATION", "RESOLVED"))
